News Roundup

This Week in AI + PMM

üéØ General-Purpose LLMs Beating Specialized Tools

The content generation test revealed a surprising trend: Claude and ChatGPT are outperforming dedicated enterprise tools on their own turf.

PMM takeaway: Before buying specialized AI software, test what free/cheap LLMs can do first.

üí° AI Tools Have "Personalities"

Different tools approach the same brief differently. Claude leans tactical and detailed. ChatGPT leans strategic and conceptual.

PMM takeaway: Know which tool to use for which task. Match the tool to the job.

‚ö†Ô∏è The Verification Problem

AI-generated competitive intel is plausible but unverified. Both tools hallucinated specific details with confidence.

PMM takeaway: AI is a first draft, not a finished product. Build verification into your workflow.
